title: Why were two different vaccines used to treat HIV, if one was more effective than the other?
description: Answer: One of the challenges of developing a vaccine for HIV is the high genetic diversity of the virus, which can mutate and evade the immune system. Therefore, some researchers have proposed using a combination of two different vaccines, each targeting a different part of the virus, to elicit ...
